description: My favorite person is Niki. Our wedding is in July, feel free to join us and bring lots of gifts.

name: Cheese Curds
description: One of my favorite foods is deep fried cheese curds. I grew up in Wisconsin, so it makes sense.

name: Super Mario World
description: Super Mario World for Super Nintendo was my favorite game as a kid and still is.

name: Discmania P2
description: The P2 is my favorite disc. It is a putter made by discmania. The Spanish pronunciation of the name is "PeDos" which translates to farts.

name: Partly Cloudly, High of 77°F
description: I'm a big fan of big floaty puffy clouds. Also warm weather.
